bibliography_entries.line_html: Bayan, George. “Les synaxaire arménien de ter-Israel III: Mois de Sahmi.” Patrologia Orientalis 15.3 (1920): 295–438 (entry for October 23 contains only the Hegesippus account, including mention of James’ burial, pp. 361–65).
bibliography_entries.line_text: Bayan, George. “Les synaxaire arménien de ter-Israel III: Mois de Sahmi.” Patrologia Orientalis 15.3 (1920): 295–438 (entry for October 23 contains only the Hegesippus account, including mention of James’ burial, pp. 361–65).

bibliography_entries.line_html: Bayan, George. “Les synaxaire arménien de ter-Israel V: Mois de Kalotz.” Patrologia Orientalis 18 (1924): 3–208 (entry for December 25 includes brief summary of the Hegesippus account, p. 103; restatement of portions of Hegesippus with comments about James being ordained by Jesus and being responsible for the change of the focus of the church’’s mission from Jews to Gentiles, pp. 116–17).
bibliography_entries.line_text: Bayan, George. “Les synaxaire arménien de ter-Israel V: Mois de Kalotz.” Patrologia Orientalis 18 (1924): 3–208 (entry for December 25 includes brief summary of the Hegesippus account, p. 103; restatement of portions of Hegesippus with comments about James being ordained by Jesus and being responsible for the change of the focus of the church’’s mission from Jews to Gentiles, pp. 116–17).
